com.github.codeteapot.jmibeans

Interface Machine


  • public interface Machine
    Machine available in the platform context.

    A machine is implicitly uniquely referenced. All of its facets return that reference via the MachineFacet.getRef() method.

    Its facets determine the operations that can be performed. Each facet implements a particular interface, and there cannot be more than one implementing the same. So there can't be more than one facet instance of the same type and with the same reference.

    In this way, this concept is abstracted from the machine's proprietary infrastructure.

    See Also:
    PlatformContext

      Function<Machine,Stream<F>>      		 facetFilter(Class<F> type)

    • Method Detail

      • getFacet

        <F extends MachineFacet> Optional<F> getFacet(Class<F> type)
        Returns the facet of the specified type, if any.
        Type Parameters:
        F - The type implemented by the facet.
        Parameters:
        type - The class of the type implemented by the facet.
        Returns:
        The Optional with the facet that implements the specified type. Or empty if there isn't.

      • facetGet

        static <F extends MachineFacet> Function<Machine,Optional<F>> facetGet(Class<F> type)
        Function that, given a machine and a facet type, returns an Optional with a machine if that type is implemented. Or an empty Optional otherwise.

        Intended to be used with Optional.flatMap(Function), 

         context.lookup(ref)
   .flatMap(facetGet(SomeMachineFacet.class))
   .ifPresent(SomeMachineFacet::doSomething);
        Taking into account that PlatformContext.lookup(com.github.codeteapot.jmibeans.machine.MachineRef) returns an Optional object of type Machine.
        Type Parameters:
        F - The type that should implement the facet.
        Parameters:
        type - The class of the type that should implement the facet.
        Returns:
        The Optional with the facet that implements the specified type, for the specified machine. Or empty if there isn't.

      • facetFilter

        static <F extends MachineFacet> Function<Machine,Stream<F>> facetFilter(Class<F> type)
        Function that, given a machine and a facet type, returns a Stream with a machine if that type is implemented. Or an empty Stream otherwise.

        Intended to be used with Stream.flatMap(Function), 

         context.available()
   .flatMap(facetFilter(SomeMachineFacet.class))
   .forEach(SomeMachineFacet::doSomething);
        Taking into account that PlatformContext.available() returns a Stream of objects of type Machine.
        Type Parameters:
        F - The type that should implement the facet.
        Parameters:
        type - The class of the type that should implement the facet.
        Returns:
        The Stream with the facet that implements the specified type, for the specified machine. Or empty if there isn't.
